channel.title: Help finding a digital camcorder
channel.description:
Basically, yes.
Specs:
Uses either AA batteries (no more than 2) or a rechargable battery that comes with it. A good recording resolution...? Long battery life while recording. Records directly either to DVD or memory. Records Sound.
<100 Pounds! Please make it a UK site.
If you can help, I'll reward you 5x in the custom ways ;)

item.title: Help finding a digital camcorder
item.dc:creator: @MuRcha_nDI_e MuRchâ‚¬nDI$e
item.description:
@MuRcha_nDI_e wrote:

usualy camcorders have LOADS of batterys,
i have ( it’s not really a camcorder, ) a CANON powershot A 400, it camed with a 16MB ms SD card, ( if u have a plug in for that in ure computer it’s verry good ! ) now there’s a 512MB card in it, and i can film about 2 hours, it has only 2 batteries, but u can only film 30 minutes with them…
it has a sound recorder, u can take picture’s with a timer, film, it has a build in paint program! u can zoom x7 in/out, it has a fast key to print, if u don’t have a SD lock in ure computer, it has a usb lock. i’m verry happy about it, don’t know if this is what ure looking for, i can’t remember the price but is was pretty decent.

Read full topic
